title: The Netherlands won Eurovision 2019! What do you think of their feat? - Quora

response.answer_text: Since 2013 Netherlands has turned their fortune around so it was only a question of when would they win. Imagine, only a decade ago Netherlands could only dream of going to finals. Liked the song from the beginning. Reminds me of Coldplay, my favourite band so that is a plus. However I thought the live performance was a bit disappointing. He was hidden by that big piano and he barely looked into the camera. Still a worthy winner with a good song! I think we also can feel joy for Netherlands who hasn’t won since 1975!

Musically, I think it was a good song with ok lyrics by a good performer with a great network. Also, having seen some (not all) of the other contestants, and having heard others about the rest, I think that the Eurovision should work on increasing the quality of submissions. It might be fun to watch again if it weren’t a contest of ‘least terrible’. Now, having said that, this means half the country will be arguing about the organisation of the 2020 edition, and that’ll be more terrible and toe-curling than the aforementioned submissions.
